ARABIC: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will not be able to make a will or return to their families.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then they would not be able to make a will, or go back to their people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and they will not even be able to make a testament, nor to return to their households.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Then they will not be able to make a will or return to their families.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore neither able to make a will, nor returning to their homes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then they will not be able to make bequest, nor they will return to their family.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So they shall not be able to make a bequest, nor shall they return to their families.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then they will not be able to make any testament, nor will they return to their people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then they cannot make bequest, nor can they return to their own folk.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They will have no time to make a will, nor shall they return to their own people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they will not be able to make a disposition, nor to their family they return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then they will not be able to make any will, nor will they return to their folks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: No (chance) will they then have, by will, to dispose (of their affairs), nor to return to their own people!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then they will not be able to make bequest, nor they will return to their family.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then they will be unable to make a will, nor shall they return to their kinsmen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will not be able to make a will, nor will they return to their families.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they will not be able [to give] any instruction, nor to their people can they return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:50] Then they will not be able to make any testament, that is, to make a bequest, nor will they return to their folk, from their markets and their businesses, rather they will die then and there.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then they cannot make bequest) it is also said that this means: they cannot speak, (nor can they return to their own folk) from the marketplace; it is also said that this means: nor can they answer back their families.
